item.description:
I did this race last year... It was a fun challenging course.

Lunenburg, MA 1:00PM Donnelly Tavern, 43 Summer St. (Out and back course with downhill finish)
Contact: Rene Lavoie (North Medford Club). 1-508-380-6268 rainman52@verizon.net

Directions: Rte 2 to exit 32 to rte 13 north, Main St. for 2 miles. Left onto North St. at
King’s Corner for 1 mile to Donnelly’s Tavern on right.

Entry fees: $5.00 for all non-members, $3.00 for NMC members who want a prize,
no entry fee for NMC members who waive prize.
item.name: Donnelly’s Tavern 5 mile Road Race
